Description:
To coordinate with in-house & external laboratories to arrange testing of products and raw materials and verify the reported results against the requirement / specification.  
To follow up with agencies (like testing lab, calibration agency, material supplier) to gather required documents (MTC, Test report, Data Sheet, MSDS etc.)
To identify relevant portions of project specification related to concrete products and concrete ingredients to prepare Compliance Statement / Comparison Statement / Technical Submission for concrete products & raw ingredients. Skills
Skills:
Worked with company into manufacturing of Concrete Products (Paver/Tile/kerb) / Precast / Ready Mixed Concrete. 
Clear understanding about Concrete, Concrete products & concrete ingredients. 
Conversant with the requirements of BS, BS-EN & ASTM standards related to concrete products & raw materials. 
Familiar with Inspection & Test Plan (ITP) and Calibration Plan for Monitoring & Measuring Devices. Ability to ensure testing & calibration as scheduled
Familiar with requirements of Dubai / Abu Dhabi Municipality related to concrete pavers/ tiles /kerb etc.
Conversant to use Word, Excel for daily work, can categorize various documents, records and maintain them in soft and hard form for future reference.
Familiar with documentation requirements of ISO 9001 / 14001 / 45001.
Knowledge of In-house testing of products /materials will be an added advantage.
